title: Braum Tips and Tricks

embed.description: Up your support game with these 3 Braum tips! The song is Summertime by K-391 download it free here https://soundcloud.com/k-391/summertimes

body: Just a video I made with some lesser known Braum tips.

replies.body: Nice video man, I don't play Braum but I know people who do, I'll send them your way
Well done bro, actually well spoken and easily understood. I have played Braum once and I didn't know wtf I was doing. I may give him a go now :p
